title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Higher Vocational Education Using Blended Cross-Cultural Awareness Experience Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend English texts from diverse cultural backgrounds with 70% or higher accuracy
Learners can recognize intercultural communication differences and utilize three or more English reading strategies reflecting these differences
Learners can perform self-directed English reading learning five or more times per week via mobile platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
